text:
Both Tomcat 5 and Tomcat 6 have the following in the top-level footer section:

Current stable version is m.n.o

Tomcat 7 does not; perhaps it should?

Also, there's an old (August) version of TC7 still on the current dist.

[Likewise for TC6; TC5 only has the current version]
creator: sebb@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text:
There is no reason to change the Tomcat 7 download page. That text is there as we may release 6.0.x+1 as beta when 6.0.x is stable. We don't do that for Tomcat 7.

I have removed the old releases from /dist.
